column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I should say first of all that I've been an Uno's girl from my youth.  That said
column2: I prefer a denser crust and slightly more flavorful toppings.  If you prefer your Chicago style with a lighter
column3: more buttery crust and lighter toppings (well
column4: excpet for the cheese - this place loaded it on)
column5: Lou Malnati's is better for you.  For more flavor
column6: go Uno's (the one downtown on Wabash
column7: NOT! the crappy Uno's Chicago chain in the burbs and on the coast!!!)  Of course
column8: if what you need is just a filling pizza then this works too.
